Who: CYCLONUS, DEEPSTRYKE, PHOBIA, NIGHTRAZOR, Hydras, Darkhawk
Location: Black Fortress - Throne Room

> "Your idea, cyclonus is the best... Start with it." said dryly the Predacpn
> leader

Cyclonus nodded as he looked over at Hydras and then turned to look at
the other figures in the room. Cyclonus seemed ready to say something
else when something on his panel began to beep at him. He glanced over
. . .

"Hydras!" Cyclonus said, his face alarmed, as he tayped in some
commands. He glanced back at Hydras as his fears were confirmed,
"Someone has attempted to open all the prison cells!"

The voice of the Dark Fortress' main computer announced, "New Maximal
Signature detected!" and an alarm began to go off!

(OOC: Oh yes, time for the FUN to begin!!!!!!!)
